about_the_game:
ZM Desktop Elf is your cross-dimensional partner! This cute desktop assistant software will not only boost your working efficiency with scheduling,organization,and file searching but also make more fun for your work and life through diverse interactions.Dress up, touch, talk, and even you can edit her customized responses through the behavior editor.She will always be by yours side and create sweet memories with you.

Efficiency Up!

ZM Desktop Elf integrates efficiency tools such as a to do list, smart desktop organization, and quick file searching.Whether it's a busy workday or a relaxed weekend, she will help you to manage time and resources efficiently.

Deeply Interacition!

More than a tool, She is a lovely virtual partner!Dress her up with various outfits and accessories to create your favorite style!



Interact deeply through touch and conversation, feeling her warmth and companionship, making your relationship more intimate.

Behaviour Customization!

Use the behavior editor to customize her actions and text responses to suit your preferences.Let her become your soulmate, providing thoughtful help and encouragement anytime!



Key Features

  • Dress up: A variety of outfits and accessories to create your unique style of virtual partner.
  • Behavior Editor: Customize her responses to suit your preferences.
  • Emotional Support: She is your soulmate, try to create more sweet memories together!
  • Smart Reminders: Manage important task with user-friendly smart reminders.
  • Quick Searching: Efficient file searching will help you quickly find needed files, boosting efficiency.
  • Personalized Experience: Teach her to become your preferred style, and gain your unique experience.

ZM Desktop Elf is your work assistant and even more a considerate life partner. Whether working or relaxing, she will always be your side, sharing every wonderful moment.

content_descriptors.notes: ZM Desktop Elf contains general mature content：Revealing outfits and some sexually suggestive character interactions

name: ZM Desktop Elf

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-7400/AMD Ryzen 3 1300X
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 760/AMD HD7950
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-10500/AMD Ryzen 5 6600H
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1050ti/AMD RX 470
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Your cross-dimensional partner! This girl assistant will help you manage tasks, organize desktop, search files, and boost productivity. Customize her reactions with the behavior editor, and interact through outfits, touch, and conversation. She'll always be by yourside, creating wonderful memories.
